name: Demonic Deity
description:
Demonic Deity is an RPG game with turn based combat (battle sequences) The final release version will probably be quite different to this version and will, hopefully, be 3D.

Please bare in mind that this version of the game contains only a very simplified version of about 5% of the planned story and is on no way complete. But I am expecting to have it done by roughly January 2018.

Any feedback is greatly appreciated.

Any money gained will be used to continue progress on the full game.
